title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. 
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in library file.
2. Select the label item in library outline view.

OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.

EB: The expected behavior is that when a user selects an item in the library outline view, that specific item should be selected, rather than the focus jumping to the library file node.

SR: 
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Try to select the label item in the library outline view.
